message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your offer and my budget of $12,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair compromise considering your offer and my initial price. What do you say?

I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $13,000. This is the maximum I can afford. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to accept.
